pageContext.claim: “Our first lady has been a woman of great grace and beauty and dignity. And so popular with the people, so popular with the people.”
pageContext.analysis: In reality, Melania Trump leaves the White House with the worst popularity rating for any first lady at the end of her term in polling history. "The latest CNN/SSRS poll had Trump's favorable rating at 42% to a 47% unfavorable rating," CNN reported. "The 47% is the highest unfavorable rating we ever recorded for Trump. It's also amazingly high from a historical perspective."
